name: Unexpected Quest
description:
SOLVE THE STRANGE MYSTERIES AND ARROUND YOU AND FIND YOUR MOTHER

The explorer Little Timmy was relaxing in his room when he suddenly hears his mother calling him for help. He discovers that she is a little ill and so, at her request, he goes off to get her medicine. What he didn't expect was that his mother would be gone when he got back home. To find her, he must now investigate and follow all the clues that lead him to discover what happened to his mother. Will he be ready for what's coming?

"Mom... where are you?"

On February 24th, 2023, join little Timmy in his Unexpected Quest and help him discover what happened to his mother.

  • A single-player, narrative-driven adventure game with an amazing story.
  • Lots of side-stories for you to unravel on your journey!
  • Discover your town, know your surrounding and who is surrounding you.
  • Simple gameplay.
Controls
  • Arrow keys - Move the player character
  • Z - Interact with objects and npcs
The Studio

Unexpected Quest®  produced by Nebula Riders Studios is an academic project developed for an internal GameJam like event. The objective was to build an narrative-driven, exploration gameboy game within 1 week.

The Team:
  • Martim Alves - Artstation, Instagram, LinkedIn
  • Pedro Ferreira - Artstation, Instagram, LinkedIn
